siteMetadata.title: Tilen Kranjc
siteMetadata.subtitle: (Bio)Medical image analysis | Data science | Developer | Entrepreneur | Crypto enthusiast

markdownRemark.html:
Welcome to my landing page.

I am a bioinformatician, an entrepreneur and a coder. My day job is at Biosistemika, my night job is freelancing, my free time job is being a dad.

Data science, visualisation and communication has been always my passion. You can find some examples in my posters and figures.

I particularly enjoy analysis of biological data. My speciality is biological and medical image analysis.

If you feel you could use my help, feel free to get in touch!

frontmatter.title: Programming for life scientists - Beginners' course
